radiographic_examinations.findings: Extensive diverticulosis of the sigmoid colon is noted, with a low-density collection at the tip of the appendix measuring 1.6 cm x 1.4 cm with surrounding inflammatory changes, concerning for tip appendicitis with adjacent abscess formation. Visualized lung fields are within normal limits. No evidence of pleural or pericardial effusion, normal liver, pancreas, spleen, adrenals, kidneys, stomach, and unremarkable reproductive organs.
